instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, in the video that you are watching, tap the screen to pause the video. Any actor that has been identified will have a circle on their face. To learn more about the actor, tap the circle.

On your Android phone or tablet, tap your screen to pause the video. If the song can be identified, cards will show the song's title, artist, and where you can download the song, album, or soundtrack on Google Play.
